NAME: SCUMM boot params
DESC: A partial list of the bootparams of some SCUMM games.

BODY.p: Some of these lists are based on the output of ./scummvm -d1 -b1 TARGET; some information is also from this article. In particular, they may contains some mistakes. Ultimately we plan to correct these and maybe enhance the descriptions a bit...
